title: Around the world :
author: Vanderslice, John
snippet: Next day went back to Mallow ; then to Cork ; then to Cloyne, to Queenstown, or Cove of Cork ; then back to Cork, Mallow, and Dublin, by Kingstown ; then took a steamer and crossed the Channel to Wales ; then took the cars to the Tubular Bridge, which spans an arm of the sea, and is one of the greatest bridges I ever saw.
